title: Truffle
summaries: The Truffle is a Hardmode NPC vendor who sells various mushroom-themed items. He will move in once the following criteria are met:

• There is an available vacant house.
  • The vacant house that the Truffle will move in to is located in (or near) a surface Glowing Mushroom biome (i.e. one that is above 0 elevation). Surface Glowing Mushroom biomes do not generate naturally and therefore must be manually created. 100 tiles of Mushroom grass and Glowing Mushroom plants are required to create a Glowing Mushroom biome.

Once the Truffle has moved in, he can be reassigned to a house at any elevation, as long as it is in a Glowing Mushroom biome. If he dies, he can only respawn if a house in a surface Glowing Mushroom biome is available again.

When threatened by enemies on the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the Truffle will release Mushroom Spores, which hover in midair and explode into spore clouds upon contact with enemies.
